description: These rare golden acrons can only be found in the Sacred Forest Meadow of the Kokiri Forest. They are a favorite food of the Kokiri Deer, and giving one of the animals such food will make a friend for life.
tooltip: These rare golden acrons can only be found in the Sacred Forest Meadow of the Kokiri Forest. They are a favorite food of the Kokiri Deer, and giving one of the animals such food will make a friend for life. (+10% Health - Buck Riders, Doe Trotters, and Stag Chariots)
